snippet: Apple’s chief, Timothy D. Cook, said he would improve customer service after increasingly ferocious criticism from Chinese media outlets.
abstract: Apple chief executive Timothy D Cook takes unusual step of apologizing to Chinese customers over company's warranty policy and says he will improve customer service in country.

byline.original: By DAVID BARBOZA and NICK WINGFIELD
byline.contributor: David Barboza reported from Shanghai and Nick Wingfield from Seattle.

lead_paragraph: Apple’s chief, Timothy D. Cook, said he would improve customer service after increasingly ferocious criticism from Chinese media outlets.

headline.seo: Tim Cook of Apple Apologizes to China Over Warranty Policy
headline.main: Pressured by China, Apple Apologizes for Warranty Policies
headline.print_headline: Apple Apology To Customers In China Over Repair Policy
